tr_meetingAttendanceRecord: Registro de asistencia a las reuniones
tr_welcomeCongregationDesc: Welcome to the app! Learn all the power of the app on the How to use Organized page
tr_reminderS1NotReady: The Congregation Field Service and Meeting Attendance (S-1) report has not been submitted yet.
tr_reminderS1NotReadyDesc: It should be submitted to the branch office no later than the 20th day of the month.
tr_reminderS4NotReady: Your monthly field service report has not been submitted yet.
tr_reminderS4NotReadyDesc: It should be submitted to the secretary no later than the 6th day of the month.
tr_noInternetConnectionDesc: Organized está funcionando sin conexión en este momento. Cuando vuelvas a estar en línea, cualquier dato nuevo que hayas ingresado podrá sincronizarse.
tr_requestSpeakersListDesc: The following congregations requested access to view your outgoing speakers list:
tr_publicMinistryRequestDesc: Please review the requests to serve in public ministry:
tr_tertitoryCardRequestDesc: Please review the requests for a territory card:
tr_yourRequestAcceptedDesc: La congregación {{ congregationNameAndNumber }} aceptó tu solicitud para ver su lista de oradores salientes.
tr_returnedTerritoryDesc: El territorio {{ territoryNumber }} ha sido cubierto y devuelto. El número de hogares enviado por el editor es {{ numberOfHouses }}. Si es necesario, actualice la información del territorio.
tr_shareFeebackDesc: ¿Tienes una brillante idea? ¡Compártela con nosotros! Para discusiones más técnicas o detalladas, te animamos a que utilices nuestras Discusiones en GitHub si es posible.
tr_successfullyDesc: Your feedback has been successfully submitted
tr_meetingAssignments: En este momento tienes {{ assignment }} asignaciones en reunión
tr_reportSubmittedDesc: Your report for {{ month }} has been submitted
tr_noMeetingAssignments: You have no meeting assignments at the moment
